channel.title: Mezzy-Scape Client Problem
channel.description:
Now i downloaded the Mezzy-scape source and client to try and redo what Clockwise did such a good job on.. but when i run the client ( any client for that matter ) i get this error.. [code=actionscript]NineScape 508 Client! Error occurred during initialization of VM Java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/object Press any key to continue...[/code]
I dont really know what i did to fuck up all my cients on my PC..but if some one could help me.. this is my .Run [code=autoit]@echo off color 0b @echo NineScape 508 Client! @echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game0 pause[/code]
Im Running a 64-bit...all i know is they used to work.. IF you need to look at any thing tell me and ill put it in message..thanks ReloadZ

item.title: Mezzy-Scape Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @ReloadZ ReloadZ
item.description:
@ReloadZ wrote:

Now i downloaded the Mezzy-scape source and client to try and redo what Clockwise did such a good job on…
but when i run the client ( any client for that matter ) i get this error…

NineScape 508 Client! Error occurred during initialization of VM Java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/object Press any key to continue...

I dont really know what i did to fuck up all my cients on my PC…but if some one could help me…
this is my .Run

@echo off color 0b @echo NineScape 508 Client! @echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game0 pause

Im Running a 64-bit…all i know is they used to work…
IF you need to look at any thing tell me and ill put it in message…thanks
ReloadZ

Read full topic
